children.value: Most times in the PagerDuty web UI are rendered in the desired time zone of the user currently logged in. There are some exceptions to this on the User, Team, and System reports in
. When users are added, their personal time zones will match the
by default, and they can change their

if necessary. Itâ€™s important to note that a user profile can have a different default time zone than the account level time zone, and that all on-call schedules will be viewed in your selected time zone.
Only the Account Owner can change the account-level time zone.
Log in to PagerDuty as the Account Owner.
Under Account Details, select the Default Time Zone from the drop-down menu.
under the drop-down list in the top right corner of any page.
next to the time zone under your contact information.
Select the desired time zone from the drop-down list.
